nodes.text: "You're Hired" to be Darth Vader's Secret Apprentice!

"You're Hired" to be Darth Vader's Secret Apprentice! is an interview of W. Haden Blackman and Sam Witwer conducted by Jonathan Wilkins and Brian J. Robb and published in Star Wars Insider 97. Blackman and Witwer discuss the production process of Star Wars: The Force Unleashed.
